name: Vaporcraze 8
author: Digi
description:
Inspired
 by the playful colors and designs of the late 90s and vaporwave 
asthetics, this hyper saturated palette is perfect for abstract pieces, 
fonts, and UI designs thanks to the high contrast and attention grabbing
 harmonies. Don't be fooled by the unconventional shifts though - it can
 yield surprisingly pleasing space scenes, skies, and even full 
landscapes! Deep indigo shifts through playful purples before 
skyrocketing to warmer magenta and orange, then veers crazily into green
 before finally landing on a crisp off white highlight.
